name: Terror from 1978
description: My work this time is Halloween-themed, For the sake of celebrating the event I made this work and I chose the character Michael Myers as a character in my work because he is my favorite character in the horror film series, starting from Halloween in 1963 he killed his older sister named Judith Meyers and the terror continues to this day,  Myers had no motive for him killing because he could even David Gordon Green say that Myers was an "extraordinary" human being without motivation and emotion.I describe Michael Myers walking around town during a storm on Halloween night, with a knife he took from his victim in a slow step he ignored the storm and the crowd in front of him.
